achievement.en: Unlock the __achievement__ achievement, then speak to {0} at {1} in {img2} {3} (x: {4}, y: {5}).
achievement.de: Schalte die Errungenschaft __achievement__ frei, dann sprich mit {0} bei {1} in {img2} {3} (x: {4}, y: {5}).

beastTribe.en: Achieve {0} reputation with the {i1} Beast Tribe, then purchase for {img4} {i2} {i3} from {5} {6} in {img7} {8} (x: {9}, y: {10}).
beastTribe.de: Erreiche Verbundenheit {0} mit dem {i1} Stamm, dann erwirb es für {img4} {i2} {i3} von {5} {6} in {img7} {8} (x: {9}, y: {10}).

collectorsEdition.en: Register or digitally upgrade to the {i0} of {i1} on the {2}.
collectorsEdition.de: Registriere oder rüste digital zur {i0} des/der {i1} auf der {2} auf.

msq.en: Complete the level {0} {1} main scenario quest {img2} '{i3}' from {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).
msq.de: Vervollständige das level {0} {1} Hauptszenario {img2} '{i3}' von {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).

quest.en: Complete the level {0} {1} quest {img2} '{i3}' from {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).
quest.de: Vervollständige den level {0} {1} Auftrag {img2} '{i3}' von {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).

questAfterMount.en: Complete the level {0} {1} quest {img2} '{i3}' from {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}) after obtaining __mounts__.
questAfterMount.de: Vervollständige den level {0} {1} Auftrag {img2} '{i3}' von {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}) nach dem Erhalt von __mounts__.

legacyGift.en: Given as a gift upon reaching level {0} by {1} in {img2} {3} (x: {4}, y: {5})
legacyGift.de: Als Geschenk vergeben wenn level {0} erreichend von {1} in {img2} {3} (x: {4}, y: {5})

legacyStatus.en: Given at the launch of A Realm Reborn to any players who had at least 90 cumulative days of subscription at any point during the final 9 months of Legacy.
legacyStatus.de: Beim Launch von "A Realm Reborn" an Spieler vergeben die mindestens 90 Tage Gesamtspielzeit während jeglichen Zeitpunkts während 1.0 hatten.

achievementCertificate.en: Purchase for {i0} {i1} {img2} from {3} at {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).
achievementCertificate.de: Erhältlich für {i0} {i1} {img2} von {3} bei {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).

raid.en: Awarded from a treasure chest in level {0} raid {img1} '{i2}'.
raid.de: Erhalten von einer Schatztruhe des Level {0} Raids {img1} '{i2}'.

trial.en: Randomly awarded from a treasure chest in level {0} trial {img1} '{i2}'.
trial.de: Zufällig erhalten von einer Schatztruhe der Level {0} Prüfung {img1} '{i2}'.

veteranReward.en: Received as mail from a {i0} for subscribing for {1} days.
veteranReward.de: Von einer Nachricht von {0} für Abonnieren von {1} Tagen.

recruitAFriend.en: Rewarded for having a friend subscribe for 90 days during the {i0}.
recruitAFriend.de: Belohnt wenn ein Freund 90 Tage abonniert hat während des {i0}.

goldChocoboFeather.en: Purchase for {img2} {i0} {i1}, awarded from the {i9}, from {3} {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).
goldChocoboFeather.de: Erhältlich für {img2} {i0} {i1}, belohn von {i9}, von {3} {4} in {img5} {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).
